function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Influence of implementing quarantine with different intensities and intervention times to mitigate covid-19 spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate reduction in infected curves with a small number of infected humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to increased peak value, extended peak arrival time, and longer epidemic duration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unnecessary use of strict quarantines in mild epidemic situations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demonstrated need for huge investment in financial, material, and human resources for strict quarantines","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low adherence to self-protection measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate effect on reducing peak value of infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-protection measures do not fundamentally cut off the path of spread of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to deviation from actual epidemic curve","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of self-protection measures on the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mild effect on reducing the peak value of covid-19 infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unimaginable amount of self-protection resources needed to achieve ideal results","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital isolation measures leading to increased spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate number of medical beds for infected individuals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective self-protection measures under strict quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient intervention time for designating hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectively quarantined cases in the crowds","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation in the number of medical beds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical beds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving the required number of medical beds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Medical beds reaching full capacity leading to a large-scale outbreak","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemic spreading to pre-intervention levels after a short period of containment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate home quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of covid-19 interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate quarantine measures and lockdown implementation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient medical beds and hospital isolation measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low proportion of people effectively wearing face masks","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difference between free spread trend of covid-19 in wuhan and early data from other countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Errors in case detection and data recording in wuhan","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obvious difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete data related to epidemic cases","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex natural and social factors influencing epidemic prevention","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difference between estimated covid-19 trend and actual trend in wuhan","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors impacting the effectiveness of covid-19 prevention and control measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in mapping model parameters to geographical space","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on spatiotemporal attributes such as patients’ tracking data, residents’ activity data, passengers’ travel data of buses and subways, and mobile location data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining data in a public health safety emergency, which usually features missing or incomplete coverage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on a generalized model without simulation for the fine-grained location of patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited detection in rural areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of detailed epidemic data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Problems with scientific verification of spread models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing multi-source data, such as network news data, global event databases, and remote sensing data, may pose privacy and data security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyzing crowd aggregation and interaction may lead to an increased risk of disease propagation if not handled carefully.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hospital isolation measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans but had a small effect on the arrival time of the maximum number of infected humans and the duration of the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-protection measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans and delaying the arrival of the peak number of infected humans, but had little effect under stricter quarantine measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The study analyzed the impact of quarantine, self-protection, and hospital isolation measures to slow the spread of covid-19, with high interpretability and geographical mapping of model parameters for practical intervention significance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete data on reported cases","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
